医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
无麸质饮食对女性来说总是更健康的选择吗？研究评估了无麸质饮食对女性健康的影响，揭示了对特定麸质相关疾病的益处，但警告不要进行不必要的饮食限制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Is-a-gluten-free-diet-always-the-healthier-choice-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Is-a-gluten-free-diet-always-the-healthier-choice-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=127cc69c-245e-46e3-9dff-612c19b22f7e Tue, 23 Jan 2024 19:54:00 -0500 Is a gluten-free diet always the healthier choice for women?
新型软件可测量特定基因组生物标志物的重要性，以帮助预测疾病IntelliGenes 是罗格斯健康学院创建的首款同类软件，据其开发人员称，它结合了人工智能 (AI) 和机器学习方法来测量特定基因组生物标志物的重要性，以帮助预测个体疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Novel-software-measures-the-significance-of-specific-genomic-biomarkers-to-help-predict-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Novel-software-measures-the-significance-of-specific-genomic-biomarkers-to-help-predict-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1a36843-d23d-4cfc-91f7-bb275a120895 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 14:06:17 -0500 Novel software measures the significance of specific genomic biomarkers to help predict diseases
降压药可以帮助患有自闭症谱系障碍的儿童和年轻人降低焦虑密苏里大学汤普森自闭症和神经发育中心的一项新研究发现，普萘洛尔（一种治疗高血压的药物）还可以帮助降低患有自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 的儿童和年轻人的焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Blood-Pressure-drug-could-help-lower-anxiety-for-kids-and-young-adults-with-ASD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Blood-Pressure-drug-could-help-lower-anxiety-for-kids-and-young-adults-with-ASD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=214926e9-d085-49da-9dc1-e27ab053eecf Tue, 23 Jan 2024 14:00:00 -0500 Blood pressure drug could help lower anxiety for kids and young adults with ASD
研究表明 GLP1 激动剂可降低糖尿病患者患严重肝病的风险根据瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院在 Gut 杂志上发表的一项全国性研究，Ozempic 和其他 GLP1 激动剂可降低 2 型糖尿病和慢性肝病患者患肝硬化和肝癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Study-links-GLP1-agonists-to-reduced-risk-of-severe-liver-disease-in-diabetic-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Study-links-GLP1-agonists-to-reduced-risk-of-severe-liver-disease-in-diabetic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fd9838e-625a-4662-94c0-d568a6d28b69 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:56:30 -0500 Study links GLP1 agonists to reduced risk of severe liver disease in diabetic patients
科学家找到了治疗结节病的新方法由 Georg Stary（维也纳医科大学和 CeMM）领导的研究小组发现了一种治疗炎症性疾病结节病的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Scientists-identify-a-new-approach-to-treating-sarcoidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Scientists-identify-a-new-approach-to-treating-sarcoidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=642e5452-3a97-4801-9fc5-78b239b4c68a Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:42:44 -0500 Scientists identify a new approach to treating sarcoidosis
研究人员开发了一种监测技术来识别引发心房颤动的个体因素来自立陶宛两所大学的研究人员开发了一种患者安全监测技术，用于识别和管理引发心房颤动的个体因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Researchers-develop-a-monitoring-technology-to-identify-individual-factors-provoking-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Researchers-develop-a-monitoring-technology-to-identify-individual-factors-provoking-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4053d1e0-bf91-4ed9-8f8e-1353fc7fe068 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:34:19 -0500 Researchers develop a monitoring technology to identify individual factors provoking atrial fibrillation
研究为戊型肝炎病毒的进化动态提供了宝贵的见解多种药物的联合治疗比仅一种活性化合物更有效。至少首先是这样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Study-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-evolutionary-dynamics-of-hepatitis-E-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Study-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-evolutionary-dynamics-of-hepatitis-E-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2187b89-c2a0-4e86-9b8b-9c68b8c74837 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:17:48 -0500 Study provides valuable insights into the evolutionary dynamics of hepatitis E virus
NIH 拨款资助同种异体移植排斥芯片模型的开发寺崎生物医学创新研究所助理教授 Vadim Jucaud 博士获得了美国国立卫生研究院的资助，用于开发功能性器官芯片来模拟同种异体移植排斥反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/NIH-grant-funds-the-development-of-allograft-rejection-on-a-chip-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/NIH-grant-funds-the-development-of-allograft-rejection-on-a-chip-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=235256a8-ae12-47d0-b890-85aa4ca11687 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:12:25 -0500 NIH grant funds the development of allograft-rejection-on-a-chip model
SynNeurGe：用于帕金森病研究的新生物分类系统开发帕金森病的有效治疗方法如此具有挑战性的原因之一是其复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/SynNeurGe-A-new-biological-classification-system-for-Parkinsons-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/SynNeurGe-A-new-biological-classification-system-for-Parkinsons-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a844fe5-7382-433f-902e-beb3cd339ffe Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:07:52 -0500 SynNeurGe: A new biological classification system for Parkinson's disease research
童年时期的照顾者温暖可以保护以后的心血管健康先前的研究已经证实，童年时期在家庭中遭受虐待、忽视和滥用药物的经历可能会恶化一个人一生的心脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Caregiver-warmth-during-childhood-protects-cardioangio-health-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240123/Caregiver-warmth-during-childhood-protects-cardioangio-health-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75c5f04a-a275-4c6a-a96d-97ce6393c68e Tue, 23 Jan 2024 13:00:18 -0500 Caregiver warmth during childhood protects cardiovascular health later in life
